      â–Œ  â– [RELEASE NOTES]â– 

      â–€   
         Are you ready to kick things into Overdrive? Good, because the
         Awesomenauts: Overdrive expansion is here! Get it today and gain
         immediate access to three brand-new charaters, including:

         * the time-travelling Professor M. Yoolip
         * the hyperbike-riding bounty hunter Chucho Krokk
         * Jimmy and the LUX5000
         
         In addition to these premium characters, the Overdrive
         expansion includes the following features for all users who own
         the Awesomenauts base game:

         * Overhauled Game Mechanics - fight as a team, win as a team!
           The XP and Leveling System, which was introduced in a recent
           update to Awesomenauts, is a new core mechanic of the game and
           the first big step of many changes to come. WeÎ“Ã‡Ã–ll continue to
           iterate on various game mechanics in the coming months.
         * Visual Update - We're giving some love to our existing
           content! For example, Sheriff Lonestar and all of his animations
           and costumes have received a complete visual overhaul! More
           content that has been with us since the launch of Awesomenauts
           will receive visual updates over the next several months!
           
         NOTE: Previous updates & DLC included.
